conclusion: Determine the speed v_b of rod b when the speed of rod a is v_a = 1.0 m/s using principles of electromagnetism, energy conservation, and Newton's laws.
Induced emf in the circuit is calculated as 0.1 V when rod a moves with velocity v_a.
Total resistance of the circuit is 0.2 Î©, and the current in the circuit is 0.5 A.
Ampere force on rod a is calculated as 0.05 N.
Ampere force on rod b is also 0.05 N.
Net force on rod a is calculated as 0.45 N.
Net force on rod b is calculated as -0.45 N.
